name: Tomb of the Dead
description:
TOMB OF THE DEAD is a brutal arcade shooter with a classic 90s look and feel. Mow down swarms of demonic monsters and survive for as long as you can.

Features:

  • Fleshy guttural sounds & evil dark ambient!
  • Pure demon slaying madness!
  • Earn points to buy better flesh weapons from a mystery carcass.
  • Use headphones! Every sound made by weapons and enemies is low frequency brutality!
  • Every enemy produces ultra low guttural pulsating sounds with a rhythm. Pay close attention to the bass heavy patterns and you will survive long enough to see the worm.
  • No camping - demons will punish you hard!
  • Shoot the evil spawn towers to increase the change to get ammo.
  • Floating rib cage heads will pulverize you in seconds if not fighting hard enough.
  • Buy open doors made out of guts and flesh to expand the tight map.
  • One hardcore achievement - make it to wave 10 and get on top of the giant worm that devours everything in its path!
  • Slay massive waves of undead creatures!
